<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Add Contact">5eefeeba83ffc210b3fb7230feaad363</macroponent><name>contact_created_message/now_default/caption</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  const contactName = api.state.contactData.name || "";
	return `${contactName}'s contact record was successfully created`;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>reece.poulsen</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-07 22:05:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>317bf33e83f70610b3fb7230feaad324</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>contact_created_message/now_default/caption</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BAM - You & I Builder Live!
